attributes.review: The app took FOREVER to download. Hours and hours later when it actually did download I seen a button that said “Press Here” so of course I did AND THEN MY PHONE BLEW UP. I am current an my laptop writing this very true and traumatic experience.
attributes.title: Worst app ever made throughout time

attributes.review: An absolutely terrible app. consistently asked me if i wanted notifications on even after i declined every time. i did not want to see an orange with a mouth and eyes idek why that’s a part of the app. overall terrible and hard to use. trash.
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. I’d open it then It would just close on me. Hard to navigate and understand. I’ve heard people constantly boast about how great it is and I can’t say the same. Needs some serious redesign. I do not recommend
I got this app a little but ago and it keeps crashing when I open it. I thought ir might have just been my connection but the rest of my apps are working perfectly fine.
attributes.title: Keeps Crashing

attributes.review: it’s literally so bad it made my phone run SOOOO slow and glitches out so many times. i’m pretty sure it gave my phone like a virus or something bc now ads just pop up on my phone when i’m on my home screen and this is the only app i’ve downloaded in a LONGGG time😡😡DONT DOWNLOAD!!! NO TRUMP
attributes.title: GAVE NY PHONE A VURUS

attributes.review: Best app ever. Everyone agrees. This app is the greatest app in history and everyone knows it
attributes.title: Best app of all time

attributes.review: so many glitches, ugh it’s the worst app that i’ve ever downloaded and i bet that’s for everyone who has downloaded it too!!! seriously so many bugs it literally looks like cockroaches ugh i hate this app. DESPISE THIS APP!!!! are you sure this app is qualified for the app store???? ITS NOT!!! ❤️😼🥱🥱😛😛😹😹🥶🥶😿😿
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app was absolutely ridiculous and took days to download! It was insane. There’s so much biased and misinformation spread it SHOULD BE TAKEN OFF THE APP STORE. It took and stored a bunch of my own information and blatantly says it tracks me all times and eats up my battery. DO NOT USE, I repeat DO NOT USE. so disgusted
attributes.title: VERY disappointed

attributes.review: Whatever you do, don’t download this app! I think I got hacked through this app and am being watched!! Please don’t subject yourself to this kind of invasion of privacy! It may be an extension of surveillance from the government in order to watch your every move!
attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD!!! I THINK I GOT HACKED!!!

attributes.review: I got depression for using this app🤬🤬🤬 it’s the worst thing I have ever seen, don’t ever download this app, when you open the app you see an ugly orange🍊monster looking at you, do you wanna see an orange monster and get more depressed?! Well I think this app is perfect for you!
attributes.title: I got depression
